mapper.select: select id,dict_name as dictName,dict_value as dictValue ,sort from dict where group_id = 'model'

select b.bike_no as bikeNo, b.model, b.b_type as bType, b.gys, b.remain_num as remainNum, d.dict_name as modelName from bicycle b LEFT JOIN dict d ON b.model = d.dict_value
and b.b_type like '%${bType}%'
